nodes.text: Galaxy of Fear: Ghost of the Jedi
Galaxy of Fear: Ghost of the Jedi is the fifth book in the young readers Star Wars: Galaxy of Fear series.
Tash, Zak, and their uncle Hoole are on the run from evil Imperial scientist Borborygmus Gog. The only place to hide is on Nespis 8, an abandoned space station.
There used to be a giant Jedi library on Nespis 8. According to Deevee, the library is still there, but it's cursed…and haunted by the ghost of a Jedi.
If they can find the library, maybe Tash and Zak can find a way to stop Gog.
But something evil dwells on Nespis 8.
And it's much scarier than a Jedi ghost.

On the run from the Empire and Borborygmus Gog, Zak and Tash Arranda together with their uncle Mammon Hoole are offered sanctuary by a mysterious figure called "Forceflow", on the abandoned Jedi space station Nespis 8. when several "fortune hunters", hunting for lost items on the station, begin to go missing, the group discover an abandoned Jedi library, and the ghostly form of Aidan Bok.
